chapter.text: You walk inside the greenhouse after the monster leaves through another door in the back. ^1500Walking inside, it takes a second for your eyes to adjust to the dimly lit area, but when they do you find a pair of lifeless eyes looking right back at you. ^1500The face is mangled and broken, but you know those eyes. ^1500You look around for more clues and find your jacket attached to a body that is nearly cut in half.
